simulation

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.AGrid
      • simulation.Grid

  • public class Grid
extends AGrid
    Grid class, contains all essential information about the grid used, as well as the methods needed. Extends the abstract class Grid.
    Author:
    Miguel Rodrigues, nr 76176, Afonso Soares, nr 81086

      • AddZone

        void AddZone(int xini,
             int yini,
             int xfin,
             int yfin,
             int cost)
        Creates the edges that constitute the special cost zone. Also verifies if there is already an edge and updates its cost if the the new cost is higher, calling the method ExistEdge().
        Parameters:
        xini - - X parameter of the initial point of the special cost zone
        yini - - Y parameter of the initial point of the special cost zone
        xfin - - X parameter of the final point of the special cost zone
        yfin - - Y parameter of the final point of the special cost zone
        cost - - Cost of that zone

      • ExistEdge

        private int ExistEdge(Edge a)
        Method to check if the given edge exists in the ArrayList of edges and return its cost if it does. Also updates the edge if it exists and the new edge's cost is higher. The equals method in Edge is overridden to return true if the edge is up->down or down->up as well as if is left->right or right->left. Returns the cost of the edge if it was found. If not, returns 0, informing that there is no edge with special cost corresponding to the edge given.
        Parameters:
        a - = Edge we are looking for in the list of edges with special cost. Cost must be updated if its higher than the one stored.

      • calculateCost

        public int calculateCost(java.util.ArrayList<Point> a)
        Method to calculate the cost of a given path received as input. For each set of two Points, checks if the edge formed by them is present on the ArrayList of edges.
        Specified by:
        calculateCost in class AGrid
        Parameters:
        a - - List of Points that form the path of which we want to know the cost
        Returns:
        the value of the cost of the path

      • isObstacle

        boolean isObstacle(Point a)
        Checks if the given point is an obstacle, by checking if the obstacle list contains that Point. Returns true if it does, else returns false. * @param a- Point to test
        Specified by:
        isObstacle in class AGrid

      • nextPoint

        public Point nextPoint(Point a)
        Method to decide which point should the individual follow next, based on the generation of a random number between 0 and 1. Checks what possible moves it can make (based on the size of the grid and the obstacles that exist), in the following order:UP,RIGHT,DOWN,LEFT. The possible moves are stored in an ArrayList from which a position is chosen based on the random number generated and the amount of options available. Returns the point to where the individual is going to move.
        Specified by:
        nextPoint in class AGrid
        Parameters:
        a - - Actual point of the individual
        Returns:
        Point - Next point of the individual
